backend/main.mo: Backend canister implementing file storage, folder management, access control, approval flows, role assignment, and basic user profile handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for recent UI and preview viewer enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, access control, profile setup flow, conditional UI loading, and frontend canister ID registration.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending-approval screen showing user principal info and copy-to-clipboard UI.
Empty file placeholder for admin management UI.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Comprehensive file/folder manager with navigation, search, uploads, previews, creation, deletion, and modal-based file viewing.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal component that loads and previews files of various types with navigation, fullscreen, and download support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the upload component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link with an icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login/logout, theme toggle, user info display, and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin dialog for managing members, roles, storage stats, and user removal with mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: User onboarding form that validates and saves unique usernames with debounced checks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to identity, invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user access checks, profile operations, approvals, and file queries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Resolves backend and frontend canister IDs from env vars, window, URL, or fallback sources.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Utility functions for file extensions, MIME types, and determining preview capabilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, versions, and functional summaries for an ICP-based file storage app.
